# 整数Nと整数列（長さN）を受け取り、その中に含まれない最も近い整数を返す
def find_nearest_num(X, N, p):
    p_min = min(p)
    p_max = max(p)
    nums = list(range(p_min-1, p_max+2))

    nums_sub = [n for n in nums if n not in p]
    nums_sub.sort(key=lambda x: abs(X-x))

    return nums_sub[0]

if __name__ == "__main__":
    X, N = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(find_nearest_num(X, N, p))

# Get input
X = int(input())
N = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Find available numbers
available = set(range(1, 101))

for i in p:
    available.remove(i)

# Find nearest number
nearest = None

for i in available:
    if nearest is None or abs(X - i) < abs(X - nearest):
        nearest = i

print(nearest)

# ==========
# Solution 1
# ==========

x, n = map(int, input().split())
p = set(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(101):
    if i not in p:
        print(i)
        exit()

# ==========
# Solution 2
# ==========

x, n = map(int, input().split())
p = set(map(int, input().split()))

if x in p:
    while x in p:
        x += 1
elif x not in p:
    while x not in p:
        x -= 1
print(x)
